These are my color code for Super Mario 64
If the code cannot be read please, make sure you're using the right region or use other ROMs such as European one and don't copy everything on there, otherwise it won't work.
NTSC: 
8107EC20 0000
8107EC22 FF00
8107EC24 0000
8107EC26 FF00
8107EC28 0000
